mapper.update: UPDATE BANKBOOK SET BOOKNAME = #{bookName}, BOOKRATE = #{bookRate}, BOOKSALE = #{bookSale} WHERE BOOKNUMBER = #{bookNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BANKBOOK (bookNumber, bookName, bookRate, bookSale) VALUES (bankbook_sqe.nextval, #{bookName}, #{bookRate}, #{bookSale})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum R, BK.* FROM (SELECT * FROM BANKBOOK ORDER BY BOOKNUMBER desc) BK) WHERE R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
